content: For the first quarter of 2022, we reported revenue of $51.9 million, up 58% year-over-year in constant currency. SG&A costs were $20.3 million in the first quarter, up 74% versus the same period last year in constant currency. Our Americas business grew revenue and adjusted net revenue 220% and 226% in constant currency, respectively, with approximately 75% of this growth attributable to organic growth and the remainder coming from the acquisition of Karani in the fourth quarter of 2021. In connection with the acquisition of Coit Group in the fourth quarter of 2020 and Karani in the fourth quarter of 2021, our balance sheet as of March 31, 2022, reflects $4.2 million of goodwill and $5.2 million of net amortizable intangible assets. Our business exhibited very strong growth in revenue, adjusted net revenue and adjusted EBITDA across all 3 regions in the first quarter of 2022 versus the prior year quarter.
